Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Conwell F. Robinson and Gerald R. Robinson.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to grant two named individuals the right to use and occupy certain described property in Glacier National Park, Montana.
